page.title: 04 LIFE-STYLES
page.content: Mothers of pre-school children are generally at home and find a rich social life with other mums through the 'Play & Chat' Club and Playgroup. Once children are at school there is a tendency towards mothers finding full or part-time employment. A baby-sitting circle enables parents to participate in various activities outside the home. We were interested to discover - after so many warnings on our school health programmes - that 42% of the households surveyed still have at least one smoker ! In general, people care a lot about their home, how it looks and how it feels. Approximately one-third of them get away for at least two annual holidays, and nearly two-thirds for one break in the year.
